title: Same travel worries — but more of them — in State Department’s updated overview
text: BING NEWS: Same travel worries — but more of them — in State Department’s updated overview At least every six months, the State Department updates its Worldwide Caution, which warns U.S. travelers of pressing threats and dangers.
